title: From Nanny To Wife
description: Nanny, Hope Landry loves children. When the doctor told her, she could never have any of her own she decided to dedicate her life to taking care of other peoples children. When she accepts a job, taking care of Ryan Kendall's three year-old daughter she thinks it will be like any other job. She soon learns how wrong she is.Ryan Kendall is a workaholic with trust issues and a greedy ex-wife he wishes would disappear. The only bright spot in his life is his daughter Zoe. When Zoe's mother sues for full custody Ryan vows to do everything in his power to keep his daughter with him, even if it means getting married again to do it. He realizes that not just any woman will do. He needs someone who will love Zoe almost as much as he does. What he needs is Hope. Ryan convinces Hope to marry him for Zoe's sake. What he thought would be a marriage of convenience turns into something more when he and Hope find themselves falling in love. Will they be able to make it work? Or will their marriage fall to pieces?
author: Kate  Hopkins
